history.narrative: Law 4-41 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-266, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations and the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 1, 1981 and July 14, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 23, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-70 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
